output_module.f90

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 !******************************************************************************
00002 ! Module to output data for test_cases.f90 to data files in the form:
00003 ! /"probname"/"casename"/"probname"_"casename"_"variable number".dat
00004 ! /"probname"/"casename"/"probname"_"casename"_"variable number"P.dat
00005 ! /"probname"/"casename"/"probname"_"casename"_conv.dat
00006 !******************************************************************************
00007 ! REQUIRED FILES:
00008 ! PRECISION_VARS.F90            *DEFINES PRECISION FOR ALL VARIABLES
00009 ! POLY_FIT_MOD.F90              *CONTAINS SUBROUTINES TO OUTPUT DATA
00010 ! CONTROL_VARIABLES.F90         *ONTAINS VARIABLES USED IN THE PROGRAM
00011 ! RUNGE_KUTTA.F90               *CONTAINS RK CONSTANTS
00012 !******************************************************************************
00013 
00014       module  output_module
00015 
00016       use precision_vars,    only : wp
00017 
00018       implicit none; save
00019       
00020       public :: create_file_paths, output_names, init_output_files
00021       public :: output_conv_stiff,output_terminal_iteration
00022       public :: output_terminal_final,output_conv_error
00023       
00024       private
00025       character(len=80)            :: fileloc   !file  location
00026       character(len=4), parameter  :: ext='.dat'  !file extension
00027 
00028       contains
00029       
00030 !==============================================================================
00031 !  SETS FILE LOCATION VARIABLE
00032       subroutine set_file_loc()
00033       
00034       use control_variables, only : temporal_splitting,probname
00035       use runge_kutta,       only : casename
00036       
00037       fileloc=trim(temporal_splitting)//'/'// &
00038      &        trim(probname)//'/'//trim(casename)//'/' ! get file location  
00039       
00040       end subroutine set_file_loc           
00041       
00042 !==============================================================================
00043 !  CHECKS AND CREATES FILE PATHS FOR OUTPUTS
00044       subroutine create_file_paths()
00045       
00046       logical           :: dirExists   !check if directory exists
00047       
00048       call set_file_loc
00049       inquire( file=trim(fileloc)//'/.', exist=dirExists ) 
00050       if (.not.dirExists)call system('mkdir -p '//trim(fileloc)) 
00051        
00052       end subroutine create_file_paths
00053       
00054 !==============================================================================  
00055 !  WRITES PROBLEM NAME AND CASE NAME TO THE TOP OF THE TERMIINAL OUTPUT
00056       subroutine output_names()
00057 
00058       use control_variables, only : probname,temporal_splitting
00059       use runge_kutta,       only : casename
00060        
00061       write(*,*)'Problem name: ',trim(probname)
00062       write(*,*)'Casename: ', trim(casename)
00063       write(*,*)'Splitting: ', trim(temporal_splitting)
00064        
00065       end subroutine output_names
00066        
00067 !==============================================================================
00068 !  INITIALIZE OUTPUT FILES FOR ERROR OUTPUTS
00069       subroutine init_output_files(neq,ep)
00070 
00071       use control_variables, only : probname
00072       use runge_kutta,       only : casename
00073      
00074       integer,  intent(in) :: neq
00075       real(wp), intent(in) :: ep
00076       character(len=80)    :: filename   !file name and location
00077       character(len=1)     :: istr        !loop index placeholder
00078       integer              :: i
00079           
00080       do i = 1,neq
00081         write(istr,"(I1.1)")i
00082         filename=trim(probname)//'_'//trim(casename)//'_'//istr//ext
00083         open(49+i,file=trim(fileloc)//filename)
00084         write(49+i,*)'zone T = "ep = ',ep,'",'
00085         filename=trim(probname)//'_'//trim(casename)//'_'//istr//'P'//ext
00086         open(59+i,file=trim(fileloc)//filename)
00087         write(59+i,*)'zone T = "ep = ',ep,'",'
00088       enddo
00089 
00090       end subroutine init_output_files
00091       
00092 !==============================================================================      
00093 !  OUTPUTS DATA TO CONVERGENCE VS. STIFFNESS FILE
00094       subroutine output_conv_stiff(nveclen,neq,epsave)
00095       
00096       use control_variables, only : temporal_splitting,probname,jactual, &
00097      &                              b1save,b1Psave,b1L2save,var_names  
00098       use runge_kutta,       only : casename    
00099       
00100       integer,                intent(in) :: nveclen,neq
00101       real(wp), dimension(:), intent(in) :: epsave
00102       
00103       integer           :: i,j
00104       character(len=80) :: filename   !file name and location
00105       
00106       filename=trim(probname)//'_'//trim(casename)//'_conv'//ext
00107       
00108       open(35,file=trim(fileloc)//filename)
00109 !      do i=1,nveclen
00110 !        write(35,*)'zone T = "Var ',i,': ',trim(temporal_splitting),'",'
00111 !        do j=1,jactual
00112 !          write(35,50)epsave(j),b1save(j,i)
00113 !        enddo
00114 !          write(35,*)'zone T = "Var ',i,': Predicted",'
00115 !        do j=1,jactual
00116 !          write(35,50)epsave(j),b1Psave(j,i)
00117 !        enddo
00118 !      enddo
00119            
00120       do i=1,neq
00121         write(35,*)'zone T = "',trim(var_names(i)),' Variable - ',trim(temporal_splitting),'",'
00122         do j=1,jactual
00123           write(35,50)epsave(j),b1L2save(j,i)
00124         enddo
00125       enddo
00126 
00127       50 format( 10(e12.5,1x))
00128          
00129       end subroutine output_conv_stiff
00130 
00131 !==============================================================================
00132 !  OUTPUTS ITERATION INFORMATION TO TERMINAL      
00133       subroutine output_terminal_iteration(cost,mwt,ep,nveclen,neq)
00134       
00135       use poly_fit_Mod,      only : fit
00136       use control_variables, only : isamp,dt_error_tol,b,error,errorP,errorL2
00137             
00138       real(wp), dimension(:),   intent(in) :: cost
00139 
00140       integer,                  intent(in) :: mwt
00141       real(wp),                 intent(in) :: ep
00142       integer,                  intent(in) :: nveclen,neq
00143       
00144       real(wp), dimension(nveclen*2+neq) :: a,siga1,sigb1,chi2
00145       real(wp)                       :: q
00146       integer                        :: i,j
00147       integer                        :: jsamp
00148       real(wp), dimension(isamp)     :: sig
00149       
00150       sig(:)=0.0_wp
00151 
00152 
00153       !**GATHER OUTPUT VALUES
00154 
00155       do i = 1,nveclen
00156         do j=2,size(error(:,i))
00157           jsamp=j
00158           if (error(j,i)<=log10(dt_error_tol)) exit
00159         enddo
00160  
00161         call fit(cost,error(:,i),jsamp,sig,mwt,a(i),b(i),                  &
00162      &           siga1(i),sigb1(i),chi2(i),q)
00163         call fit(cost,errorP(:,i),jsamp,sig,mwt,a(i+nveclen),b(i+nveclen), &
00164      &           siga1(i+nveclen),sigb1(i+nveclen),chi2(i+nveclen),q)   
00165      enddo
00166      
00167      do i = 1,neq
00168         do j=2,size(errorL2(:,i))
00169           jsamp=j
00170           if (errorL2(j,i)<=log10(dt_error_tol)) exit
00171         enddo
00172 
00173         call fit(cost,errorL2(:,i),jsamp,sig,mwt,a(nveclen*2+i),b(nveclen*2+i),                  &
00174      &           siga1(nveclen*2+i),sigb1(nveclen*2+i),chi2(nveclen*2+i),q)
00175       enddo
00176 
00177       !**OUTPUT TO TERMINAL**
00178       write(*,60,advance="no")ep
00179 ! HACK
00180 !        do i = 1,nveclen*2+1
00181 !          write(*,60,advance="no")a(i),b(i)
00182 !        enddo
00183 !      write(*,60)a(nveclen*2+2),b(nveclen*2+2)
00184       do i = 1,neq-1
00185         write(*,60,advance="no")a(nveclen*2+i),b(nveclen*2+i)
00186       enddo
00187       write(*,60)a(nveclen*2+neq),b(nveclen*2+neq)
00188    60 format( e12.5,1x,12(f8.3,1x))
00189    
00190       end subroutine output_terminal_iteration
00191 
00192 !==============================================================================
00193 !  OUTPUTS FINAL DATA BLOCK TO TERMINAL. ITERATION INFORMATION
00194       subroutine output_terminal_final(icount,jcount,stageE,stageI,maxiter)
00195       
00196       use runge_kutta, only : ns
00197       
00198       integer,                intent(in   ) :: icount,jcount
00199       real(wp), dimension(:), intent(inout) :: stageE,stageI,maxiter
00200       
00201       real(wp) :: tmp
00202       integer  :: i
00203       
00204       tmp = 1.0_wp*icount/jcount
00205       write(*,*)'average iterations per step',tmp
00206              
00207       stageE(2:) = (ns-1)*stageE(2:)/jcount
00208       stageI(2:) = (ns-1)*stageI(2:)/jcount
00209 
00210       write(*,*)'error of initial guess is '
00211       do i = 2,ns
00212         write(*,*) i,stageE(i),maxiter(i),stageI(i)
00213       enddo
00214       
00215       end subroutine output_terminal_final
00216 
00217 !==============================================================================
00218 !  OUTPUTS CONVERGENCE AND ERROR DATA TO FILES INITIALIZED EARILER
00219       subroutine output_conv_error(cost,nveclen,neq)
00220       
00221       use control_variables, only : uvec,uexact,errvecT
00222       
00223       real(wp),         intent(in) :: cost
00224       integer,          intent(in) :: nveclen,neq
00225       
00226       integer                      :: i
00227       real(wp), dimension(nveclen) :: tmp
00228      
00229       tmp=abs(uvec(:)-uexact(:))
00230       do i = 1,nveclen
00231        if (tmp(i)==0.0_wp)tmp(i)=1.0e-15_wp  
00232       enddo
00233       
00234       do i = 1,neq
00235         write(49+i,*)cost,log10(sqrt(dot_product(tmp(i:nveclen:neq), &
00236      &                                   tmp(i:nveclen:neq))/(nveclen/neq)))
00237         write(59+i,*)cost,log10(sqrt(dot_product(errvecT(i:nveclen:neq), &
00238      &                                errvecT(i:nveclen:neq))/(nveclen/neq)))
00239       enddo
00240 
00241       
00242       end subroutine output_conv_error
00243 
00244 !==============================================================================
00245       end module output_module
